segments.text: The boy on the stool is about to fall, and no one is paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far to reach those cookies, and the stool is already wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie instead of helping him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely clueless, just drying dishes while the kids are in danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, and the floor is getting slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t hurt himself when that stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to think this is all fun and games, but it’s not.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in before this turns into a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
